truth: -  "Biotechnology uses living organisms or their components to produce useful, usually commercial, products."
fiction: -  "Biotechnology uses mythical creatures or their components to produce magical, usually enchanted, items."

truth: -  "Genetic engineering is a process where the DNA of an organism is manipulated to bring about a change in its characteristics."
fiction: -  "Genetic engineering is a process where the personality of an organism is manipulated to bring about a change in its hobbies."

truth: -  "Biotechnology has applications in four major industrial areas, including health care, crop production and agriculture, non-food uses of crops and other products, and environmental uses."
fiction: -  "Biotechnology has applications in four major recreational areas, including video gaming, theme park rides, non-food uses of popcorn, and environmental art."

truth: -  "Recombinant DNA technology is a technique that allows DNA from two different species to be combined into one molecule."
fiction: -  "Recombinant DNA technology is a technique that allows recipes from two different cuisines to be combined into one dish."

truth: -  "Gene therapy is a technique that uses genes to treat or prevent disease."
fiction: -  "Gene therapy is a technique that uses jeans to treat or prevent fashion disasters."

truth: -  "Genetically modified organisms (GMOs) are organisms whose genetic material has been altered using genetic engineering techniques."
fiction: -  "Genetically modified organisms (GMOs) are organisms whose fashion sense has been altered using fashion design techniques."

truth: -  "Bioremediation is the use of living organisms, like bacteria and fungi, to remove pollutants from the environment."
fiction: -  "Bioremediation is the use of living organisms, like elves and fairies, to remove glitter from the environment."

truth: -  "Monoclonal antibodies are identical immune cells that are all clones of a unique parent cell."
fiction: -  "Monoclonal antibodies are identical fashion models that are all clones of a unique parent model."

truth: -  "Bioinformatics is the application of computer technology to manage biological information."
fiction: -  "Bioinformatics is the application of computer technology to manage social media accounts."

truth: -  "Transgenic animals are animals that have had a foreign gene deliberately inserted into their genome."
fiction: -  "Transgenic animals are animals that have had a foreign language deliberately inserted into their vocabulary."

truth: -  "Biotechnology can be used to produce biofuels, which are fuels derived from biomass."
fiction: -  "Biotechnology can be used to produce biodegradable party balloons, which are balloons derived from biomass."

truth: -  "Pharmacogenomics is the study of how genes affect a person's response to drugs."
fiction: -  "Pharmacogenomics is the study of how genes affect a person's response to different genres of music."

truth: -  "Stem cell research is a field of study that involves the investigation of stem cells and their potential uses in medicine."
fiction: -  "Stem cell research is a field of study that involves the investigation of stem cells and their potential uses in gourmet cooking."

truth: -  "Biotechnology can be used to produce genetically modified crops that are resistant to pests and diseases."
fiction: -  "Biotechnology can be used to produce genetically modified crops that are resistant to bad weather and bird attacks."

truth: -  "Proteomics is the large-scale study of proteins, particularly their structures and functions."
fiction: -  "Proteomics is the large-scale study of proteins, particularly their taste and texture in different recipes."

truth: -  "Microbial biotechnology refers to the manipulation of microorganisms at the genetic and molecular level to generate useful products."
fiction: -  "Microbial biotechnology refers to the manipulation of microorganisms at the genetic and molecular level to generate entertaining puppet shows."

truth: -  "Biotechnology can be used to produce pharmaceuticals like insulin and human growth hormone."
fiction: -  "Biotechnology can be used to produce beverages like soda and fruit juice."

truth: -  "Tissue engineering is a sub-field of biotechnology that aims to develop tissues and organs in the lab to replace or repair damaged body parts."
fiction: -  "Tissue engineering is a sub-field of biotechnology that aims to develop tissues and napkins in the lab to replace or repair damaged table linens."

truth: -  "Biotechnology can be used to produce enzymes for industrial applications."
fiction: -  "Biotechnology can be used to produce emojis for digital communication."

truth: -  "Genetic markers are genes or DNA sequences with a known location on a chromosome that can be used to identify individuals or species."
fiction: -  "Genetic markers are genes or DNA sequences with a known location on a treasure map that can be used to identify hidden treasure chests or secret passages."
